name: Yoga/Sound Bath Women’s Retreat - with Tahirih Fields
shortDescription: This 4-day, 3 night retreat is designed for Bahá’í women, their friends, and all women regardless of their background, religion or race.
fullDescription:
This 4-day, 3 night retreat is designed for Bahá’í women, their friends, and all women regardless of their background, religion or race. It will provide an opportunity to unwind, reflect, and connect with others in a peaceful desert setting with activities – such as yoga, sound baths, devotionals, desert hikes, journaling, and bonfires – that will nourish the body, mind, and spirit. A full schedule is available here: 

docs.google.com/document/d/1-UNHO-fby7E0kFhp2-XTUrQKscQcZy0sWK3SFK7YQcQ/edit?tab=t.0

Ms. Tahirih Fields brings over 25 years of experience in the fitness and wellness industry. She is a certified personal trainer, mental fitness coach, yoga teacher and sound practitioner. Tahirih is also a wife, mother to two girls, and a member of the Bahá’í Faith. She values creating spaces where people can rest, reflect, and reconnect with themselves, with one another, and with the earth.
title: Yoga/Sound Bath Women’s Retreat - with Tahirih Fields
